body_html:
That didn't fix it for me - I'm using a Mac. But it did give me enough trying copying your linux one to a new osx_x86_64_makefile.inc containing:

# Settings for x86 on Mac
ifeq ($(TARGET), osx)
  ifeq ($(TARGET_ARCH), x86_64)
    PLATFORM_FLAGS = \
      -DTF_LITE_DISABLE_X86_NEON
    CXXFLAGS += $(PLATFORM_FLAGS)
    CCFLAGS += $(PLATFORM_FLAGS)
  endif
endif

and that does get the build working.

body:
That didn't fix it for me - I'm using a Mac. But it did give me enough trying copying your linux one to a new ```osx_x86_64_makefile.inc``` containing: 
```
# Settings for x86 on Mac
ifeq ($(TARGET), osx)
  ifeq ($(TARGET_ARCH), x86_64)
    PLATFORM_FLAGS = \
      -DTF_LITE_DISABLE_X86_NEON
    CXXFLAGS += $(PLATFORM_FLAGS)
    CCFLAGS += $(PLATFORM_FLAGS)
  endif
endif
```
and that does get the build working.
